name: Legend of Khalar
description:
A very simple single-player JRPG prototype, mainly meant to be a portfolio piece for mfisherart's character animations.

Credits:

  • Character Design, Animations, Environment Modeling - @mfisherart
  • Code, Design, VFX - @koboldskeep

Public Domain Assets:

  • Triplanar Terrain Shader -  Joyce Minions Art https://www.patreon.com/posts/quick-game-art-16714688
  • Environment Textures - Keijiro https://github.com/keijiro
  • Environment Textures - Cethyel https://twitter.com/Cethyel
